meanings.definition: Give energy or vigor to; invigorate
meanings.sent1: Running in the park is so energizing!
meanings.sent2: I find that a good night's sleep is very energizing.
meanings.sent3: The energizing music at the party got everyone dancing.
meanings.sent4: The coach's pep talk was like an energizing shot of espresso.
meanings.sent5: The sunrise over the mountains was truly energizing.

meanings.sent1: Eating a healthy breakfast is important for energizing your body.
meanings.sent2: Solar panels are used to energize homes with clean energy.
meanings.sent3: The battery pack is what energizes the remote control car.
meanings.sent4: The wind turbines help energize the entire town with electricity.
meanings.sent5: The power outage left the city in need of an energizing solution.
